name: Burnin Rubber
storyline: You are an entrant in the great Intergalactic Four Seasons Death Race! You must tackle the Spring, Summer, Autumn, and Winter sections with the objective of running as many other cars as possible off the road. The opposition is numerous and dangerous, including the slow but indestructible Tank Cars, the tricky Deathmobiles and many other Demon Drivers. You have only three lives, but you do have one advantage - your car can fly for a limited distance, allowing you to avoid obstacles if you're quick enough! All this and more makes Burnin' Rubber the car race of the century!
summary: Burnin' Rubber is an unlicensed Bump 'N' Jump clone. It is a futuristic top-down scrolling racing game where the track has no curves, but narrows and widens. There are potholes, breaks in the roads and islands that must be swerved around or jumped over. There are plenty of other cars abound, which try to run you off the road and can be bumped off the track also.
